name: GlitchScape
description: 6 Force the audience to voyage through the acousmatic videoscape.  Create conceptually synaesthetic artworks that exploit both visual and aural glitch (or other noise) artifacts at the same time. Employ these noise artifacts as a nebula to shroud the technology and its inner workings and to compel an audience to listen and watch more exhaustively.  Glitch Studies Manifesto Rosa Menkman | Art direction, Sound Design, Animation  -ΕΧΩΝ ΣΤΙΓΜΑΤΑ
